member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.CityResponse.Confidence
member.summary: A value from 0-100 indicating MaxMind's confidence that the city is correct. This attribute is only available from the Insights web service end point.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.CityResponse.GeoNameId
member.summary: The GeoName ID for the city.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.CityResponse.Names
P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.ContinentResponse.Code
member.summary: A two character continent code like "NA" (North America) or "OC" (Oceania).

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.CountryResponse.Confidence
member.summary: A value from 0-100 indicating MaxMind's confidence that the country is correct. This attribute is only available from the Insights web service end point.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.CountryResponse.IsoCode
member.summary:
The
two-character ISO 3166-1 alpha code
for the country.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.CountryResponse.GeoNameId
member.summary: The GeoName ID for the city.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.PostalResponse.Code
P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.RegionResponse.Confidence
member.summary: A value from 0-100 indicating MaxMind's confidence that the region is correct. This attribute is only available from the Insights web service end point.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.RegionResponse.IsoCode
member.summary:
The
two-character ISO 3166-1 alpha code
for the country.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.RegionResponse.GeoNameId
member.summary: The GeoName ID for the region.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.RegionResponse.Names
F:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.Response.Code
member.summary: The attribute code only show up when error exists It is a indicator of the error, not related to postal code

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.AutonomousSystemNumber
member.summary:
The
autonomous system number
associated with the IP address. This attribute is only available from the City and Insights web service end points.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.AutonomousSystemOrganization
member.summary:
The organization associated with the registered
autonomous system number
for the IP address. This attribute is only available from the City and Insights web service end points.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.Domain
member.summary: The second level domain associated with the IP address. This will be something like "example.com" or "example.co.uk", not "foo.example.com". This attribute is only available from the City and Insights web service end points.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.IPAddress
member.summary: The IP address that the data in the model is for. If you performed a "me" lookup against the web service, this will be the externally routable IP address for the system the code is running on. If the system is behind a NAT, this may differ from the IP address locally assigned to it.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.IsAnonymousProxy
member.summary:
This is true if the IP is an anonymous proxy. See
MaxMind's GeoIP FAQ

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.IsSatelliteProvider
member.summary: This is true if the IP belong to a satellite internet provider.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.Isp
member.summary: The name of the ISP associated with the IP address. This attribute is only available from the City and Insights web service end points.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.Organization
member.summary: The name of the organization associated with the IP address. This attribute is only available from the City and Insights web service end points.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.TraitsResponse.UserType
member.summary: The user type associated with the IP address. This can be one of the following values: business cafe cellular college content_delivery_network dialup government hosting library military residential router school search_engine_spider traveler This attribute is only available from the Insights end point.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.LocationResponse.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude of the location as a floating point number.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.LocationResponse.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude of the location as a floating point number.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.LocationResponse.MetroCode
member.summary: The metro code of the location if the location is in the US. MaxMind returns the same metro codes as the Google AdWords API.

member.name: P:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.LocationResponse.TimeZone
member.summary:
The time zone associated with location, as specified by the
IANA Time Zone Database
, e.g., "America/New_York".

member.name: M:Roblox.MaxMind.GeoIP2.Responses.LocationResponse.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.
